class Person[source]

Person(name:str='Tyler')

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
ucsd_student = Person()
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

Person.__str__[source]

Person.__str__()

String representation of the person

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
str(ucsd_student)

"This person's name is: Tyler"
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

Person.change_name[source]

Person.change_name(new_name)

Change the person's name

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
ucsd_student.change_name("Ty")
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
str(ucsd_student)

"This person's name is: Ty"
{% endraw %}

You can also include tests here.

{% raw %} 
name_string = "This person's name is: Ty"
assert name_string == "This person's name is: Ty"
{% endraw %}
